body: OK SO EVERY DAY FKING I GET PERFECT 30 MS OK THATS RLLY GOOD BUT AT THE NIGHT I ALWAYS DISCONNECT AND FKIGN RECONNECTING TO SERVER AND GET 500 MS FKING WHY IS IT THAT THE SERVER IS BROKEN AT NIGHT SOMEONE FKING HELP

replies.body:
When you experience latency changes during a specific time of the day, it typically means there are routing changes being made during certain hours, likely in an effort to mitigate network congestion. Sometimes this rerouting can cause your connection to take a longer path to the server, and thus increase your latency.

We can take a look at your routing after you've worked through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are 100% compatible with League. Let me know if those steps caused any change.
